channel.title: Constant Disconnections
channel.description:
This always happens randomly
[code] Connection from IP:50554 [client-3-Lukas]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 2ms] ClientHandler: Client null disconnected <ip> Disconnected Lukas, Data transfer timeout. ClientHandler: Client Lukas disconnected <ip> [/code]
and it happens when the player is ALREADY online.
This just keeps happening randomly, and i have taken out the afk timer so it should never log the player out.
Im using delta's source if its any help.

item.title: Constant Disconnections
